lenders.name: Richard+Carol
lenders.loan_because: Because we are familiar with the need and the difference that a small amount of money can make.
lenders.occupational_info: We lived and worked in Indonesia on projects related to people, forestry, fisheries and other natural resources.

lenders.name: Tania
lenders.loan_because: money is better than poverty, if only for financial reasons

lenders.name: James and Luwanna
lenders.loan_because: We see great value in the dignity and self sufficient nature of the kiva program.
lenders.occupational_info: James works as a business project manager for the Oregon Court System, and volunteers as a Kiva translator. Luwanna is an accountant for an investment firm.

lenders.name: N k
lenders.loan_because: I've been given many hands up in my life and would like to extend the opportunity to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and home with my children.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I believe that living to my highest potential includes helping others live to their highest potential!
lenders.occupational_info: I am one who helps empower and inspire people to believe in themselves, dream BIG and believe that they have the power to achieve!  Any business in service to fellow humans will be an ultimate success!

lenders.name: Dina
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful to be paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing and web development for a business credit services company. I am pretty much a geek with a selling background.

lenders.name: Al Johnson
lenders.loan_because: I believe in promoting independence
lenders.occupational_info: Al is an Electronic Technologist and Hand Drumming Teacher

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I lend because I like making a difference in other people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on software solutions for OS X, Linux, iOS, and Android.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to give back to someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I offer spiritually healing massage to people who want to transform their lives.

lenders.name: Francois
lenders.loan_because: it just makes sense to help others improve their and their children's lives

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I am abundantly blessed!

lenders.name: Johan, France
lenders.loan_because: Just a little helping hand.

lenders.name: Rudolf
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an efficient and effective way to support active people directly.

lenders.name: ernst lyder
lenders.loan_because: Just to help other ppl.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm the owner of a company that lay tile's  
In Ship and in houses. or out. great to work with yor hands  :-)

lenders.name: Torjus
lenders.loan_because: I bellive this is the best way to fight poverty. When you give people trust, they pay back in trust.
lenders.occupational_info: Economic student.

lenders.name: Dyah
lenders.loan_because: Small things done with great love will change the world (Momma T)
lenders.occupational_info:
Consultant in the fields: international development, economic development, anti-corruption, local community development (U.S. and Indonesia), homelessness and social services

Artist, media: acrylic, watercolor

photographer

lenders.name: Adam Bognar
lenders.loan_because: Many people have selflessly helped me get where I am today. I'd like to pay that forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a partner and creative director at The Still.

lenders.name: Annabella
lenders.occupation: Now retired. (used to be a medical scientist.)
lenders.loan_because: It pleases me to help others whenever I can. With the combined efforts of all the other lenders, it might just make a real difference to others.

lenders.name: 1st Bank of Wes & Connor
lenders.loan_because: Because we want to help other people to get money to do their work.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students in 3rd and 5th grade.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: I think that is the best way to help the people.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an external auditor for many small and medium company in Milan, Italy.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: It's inspiring to see people pursuing their dreams and defying the odds.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who live in poverty.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner, too. I love being self-employed. I was fortunate to have people in my life who helped me get started. I'd like to return the favor. I hope with Kiva I am.
lenders.occupational_info: In addition to running my own practice, I am an aspiring artist, basketball fanatic, and live music junkie, especially punk.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: Enterpreneurship gives people control in their lives. I have been given many gifts and it's only right that I make opportunities available to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with paper and electronic maps.  An electric utility sends information to me and I update their maps so they can see where their customers, their electric lines (overground and underground), transformers, substations, and other equipment are.

lenders.name: Randall
lenders.loan_because: Being in the 'first world', I live a very privileged life. I recognize this, and while as a student my available funds are small, they are not so small that I can't loan at least a little bit to someone with both the will and the ambition to improve their life. It is my express hope that my small contribution will aid in part be of such aid.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to university and work on campus as a teachers assistant. I major in history and philosophy.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: Richness must be shared.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I read Nicholas Kristof's article in the NY Times about Kiva.  It struck me as an excellent way to provide meaningful help throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an electrical engineer employed by IBM.   My current work involves experimental memory chip technologies that may some day be used in cell phones, digital cameras, and computers.

lenders.name: dede
lenders.loan_because: I can and cannot believe that $25 can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a High School literature teacher

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to own their own successful business.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense!
lenders.occupational_info: I am passionate about making places where people work more life-affirming, so I teach them how to work together better.

lenders.name: Rainer
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: to paraphrase a Zen proverb, "it is the giver who should be thankful"..
lenders.occupational_info: I import painted glass accessories from Peru that are created by small cottage industries.

lenders.name: Martha F.
lenders.loan_because: I think those who have resources are morally and ethically responsible for assisting those who do not.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach law and I write about human rights and other laws that try to ensure greater equality.  I am very interested in vulnerable populations and am particularly concerned with the well-being of women and children.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I think.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to convince computers to do the things I want. They resist. I love that.

lenders.name: Lisa FA
lenders.loan_because: I've always had such advantages. I want to help other people, especially other women, improve their lives and those of their families.

lenders.name: John Hammell
lenders.loan_because: I want my help to be a hand-up and not a crutch.

lenders.name: Tucker-Murray Family
lenders.loan_because: By lending, we acknowledge the extremly fortunate financial situation in which we find ourselves due to the Lord's Grace, the hard work of our ancestors and our ability to provide valued services to the current economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a state manager for a wine and spirts distributor, my wife is a medical doctor specializing in Obstetrics and Gynocology, we have two wonderful children and live in the Philadelphia suburbs.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: even I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: Many people have believed in me enough to lend and allow my business to successfully grow.  It is my turn to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy houses that need repair, fix them, and lease them.  My company provides quality, affordable housing.

lenders.name: Wharton NEO
lenders.loan_because: To show the impact of business on the world.
lenders.occupational_info: The Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania was established in 1881 as the first collegiate school of business.  Its employees support the work of faculty in educating the finest students in the world for careers in business and leadership in advancing global society

lenders.name: Bud Wonsiewicz
lenders.loan_because:
I can.  If you want to work, I want to help.
Together we can move to a more just world.
lenders.occupational_info:
I've worked in high tech helping bring high-speed access to the internet and mobile phones to the USA and the world.
I've just coauthored a book on meditation and spirituality that can be found on my web site.  I love to hike, ski, sail and travel the world.  I love to help make a difference.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because:
Giving so that someone can be self-sufficient is the best form of charity.
I believe that lending through kiva can dramatically change these people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Spanish teacher.

lenders.name: ROSE ANNE
lenders.loan_because: I BELIEVE THAT "GOD HELPS THOSE WHO HELP THEMSELVES"; AND IF MY CONTRIBUTION CAN HELP IMPROVE A LIFE & A COMMUNITY, THEN THE WORLD WILL BE A MUCH BETTER PLACE FOR ALL LIVING CREATURES.
lenders.occupational_info: AS A NEONATAL NURSE FROM 1975 TO 2012 I FOUND IT VERY REWARDING TO HELP THE BABIES GET A GOOD START IN LIFE. WITH KIVA, I HOPE TO HELP OTHERS IMPROVE THEIR LIVES.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: If we all do a little, a lot can be done.

lenders.name: Gerry
lenders.loan_because: I teach a class on economic development, including the value and success of microcredit.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and do research in international economics.

lenders.name: Brittany
lenders.loan_because: As a student with loans myself, everyone needs a little help here and there.

lenders.name: Umlaut, LLC
lenders.loan_because: It helps people.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: It's grounding.  Every time I begin worrying when money's tight, I can step back and say, wait a minute, I'm actually really fortunate.  A small loan can go such a long way in empowering and bringing dignity to people, and this grassroots effort is blowing my mind.  Sharing the wealth is a beautiful thing.

lenders.name: Guy
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone deserves the opportunity to live a good life.
It is an interesting way to get help to those who use our funds.
lenders.occupational_info: Presently the company I work with is involved in Real Estate management and invests in securities and I provide some technical support and also research several types of investment.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to cultivate entrepreneurship
lenders.occupational_info: I raise equity for third party manager

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have an opportunity to better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help order, deliver and service personal computers and laptops for a U.S. Insurance corporation.

lenders.name: Rowan
lenders.loan_because: I have followed the work of Mohammed Yunas from its early days and supported Grameen. I love the idea of being more aware of the borrowers and connected to them. Everyone should have access to credit to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I mostly work on the computer supporting the research of a group of scientists. I also do a lot of personal work for peace and interfaith cooperation.

lenders.name: Buzooti
lenders.occupation: I am "...training to be a cage fighter..."
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to touch others striving to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Chaotic nonsense.

lenders.name: Black-Bean
lenders.loan_because: I want to see people succeed!

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I want people to know that I exist, that I care, and that I am grateful for the life that I lead and the freedom that I have to create a better life for myself every day. And, plenty of people helped me get here--I want to give that same hand to another person.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell advertisements for a magazine which is fun and I also have a small pyschotherapy practice focused on body pyschotherapy. I would describe the second vocation as helping people to feel better in their bodies and in their lives.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: some wonderful things have happened recently that have changed my life. Now I would like to help change someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I investigate employee complaints

lenders.name: KRT
lenders.loan_because: My dad did this for decades before it was popular, and Kiva gives my family the opportunity to continue his legacy of sharing resources with others.  For him and for us, our faith in God motivates us to manage God's resources in the best ways that we can.  In particular, it's an excellent way to redistribute those resources to those who need what we can supply.
lenders.occupational_info: I own HelioRoast Coffee in San Francisco, which allocates 1% of monthly gross revenues to Kiva.

lenders.name: YI_SF
lenders.loan_because: I have longterm interest to help entrepreneurs in developing countries to achieve their dream of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a scientist doing research on metabolic disease.

lenders.name: Eula
lenders.loan_because: it helps people help themselves

lenders.name: Walter
lenders.loan_because: I want to help to make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others help themselves. These loans go to people that know their business; they are savvy, so there's very little risk. I firmly believe that microenterprise lending makes a huge impact: Look at the great strides that Freedom From Hunger has accomplished in child nutrition through such lending.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software documentation.

lenders.name: Cat
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great way to empower people to help and realize dreams respectively.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the music and programming for a weekly after hours event called NightLife.  Its a way for me to engage young adults about science and conservation in a relaxed and social setting.

lenders.name: Emmanuel (Manou)
lenders.loan_because: Car je le peux (because I can)
lenders.occupational_info:
Je souhaite en ma maison
Une femme ayant sa raison
Un chat passant parmi les livres
Des amis en toutes saisons
Sans lesquels je ne peux vivre.

lenders.name: Ruben
lenders.occupational_info: Ruben_Bjerketveit@hotmail.com

lenders.name: daystech
lenders.loan_because: My conscious choice to help someone in the way I am able to, adds to the balance on the side of Peace, and we all need more of that on this planet. It might seem a little corney, but my Mom always told me when you feel discouraged, try to help someone else who is worse off than you are, it'll take your mind off your own troubles. Support women in their quest to be everything they can be, no matter how different from your own life it might be.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people learn to use their computers properly, and help get things going in the right direction when they do not work as expected. My basic philosophy is something like: Light a candle rather than curse the darkness....... and do not give up when it gets difficult.

lenders.name: Shirley & Wolfie
lenders.loan_because: We believe everyone needs a helping hand... and give 10% of certain revenues to kiva.org, so others the world over can improve their own business situation.
lenders.occupational_info: Connecting folks with services, people and knowledge. Creating win/win situations, working with passion, conviction and heart.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: if I'm going to talk the talk about the benefits of private enterprise and markets, I should try walking the walk.

lenders.name: Vishal
lenders.loan_because: Microloans could make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for children who have heart problems.

lenders.name: m-a
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy reading about the people who receive the money.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mathematics at a Community College.

lenders.name: Vincent
lenders.loan_because: I am.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: It's better to help someone by giving them the means to help themselves

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because:
I have needed help and others have helped me. 

I am a single mom and I am able to do a good job because many people help me - friends, family, and sometimes strangers.

One world - one family.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a teacher.  I have taught different things - English, Art, Writing.

Sometimes I work with little kids.

Sometimes I work with old people.

Right now I teach English to immigrants.  They are all over 18 years year old or older.

My number one job is:  I am a mom.

I love helping people grow to the next level.

And I love learning more about life, growth, and people.

lenders.name: Ingunn
lenders.loan_because: To help someone improve their life 10% - much better than getting 2% for the same money in a boring savings account!

lenders.name: mirwan & lamia
lenders.loan_because: we were fortunate to have had an education to allow us a comfortable standard of living. now it is time to give back to the community.

lenders.name: Xander Page
lenders.loan_because: I want to do more than talk. I want to make a tangible and significant impact on the lives of others. I believe in an abundance mentality and I want to share the many blessings I have received! I loan because I care =)
lenders.occupational_info: I bring great ideas to life. I help grow and support people and organizations that seek to create a sustainable world of peace, abundance, and joy for all! I accomplish these goals by adding incredible value to organizations, companies, situations, and projects by utilizing my diverse skill set to maximize results.

lenders.name: Marwan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make children happier around the world
lenders.occupational_info: stable and robust

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: it's like gaining interest on my money--but socially beneficial interest.

lenders.name: Shanna
lenders.loan_because: It's important for people to be able to work. Also, small businesses are better for communities than large, impersonal companies.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy writing poems and wish to be a teacher. I work as a secretary for an insurance company.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: We are here to help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with nonprofit organizations to develop their internal capacity - to help them do what they do, better.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: it feels good. I grew up on a dairy farm in the USA where I loved the land, the animals and the way of life. I want to support women who sustain that connection with the Earth in providing for their families and communities.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I believe all people should have access to the financial services that make running a successful business possible in the world economy. I wish to support businesses that bring needed services to under-served areas.

lenders.name: The Cats
lenders.loan_because: Everyone has a dream, no matter how small the person or how big the dream...
lenders.occupational_info: We like to eat, sleep and play!  (But not necessarily in that order!)

lenders.name: EmmaFamily
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to teach our daughter the importance of giving back and the value and power of money to tranform people's lives. We want to encourage entrepeneurs everywhere to believe in themselves and their ideas 150% for that is in part what will make them successful.
lenders.occupational_info: As entrepeneurs, we started our own company and built it into an international brand with limited funds, hard work and big dreams.

lenders.name: Robert McG
lenders.loan_because: this seems a very direct way to impact people's lives.  I focus on taxi drivers because I did that as one of my very first jobs.  It's hard work, but it can benefit the community too.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people with equal talent should have an equal opportunity to succeed, regardless of where they happen to be.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need and others have so little.  I like the personal connection with someone elsewhere on the planet who is striving to better themselves and their family.  Kiva unites people regardless of gender, color, or religion for the betterment of the world one life at a time.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have recently retired after working 37 years in a large teaching hospital laboratory.  My job was to analyze blood and other body fluids to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of our patients.

Barry University Alumna Class of 1969

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I take photos of products and people for advertising agency's.

lenders.name: [UF] Maximinus
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people, and felt that this is a much better way to do so than going through a "dollar a day" (or similar) program.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites both as a job and a hobby.  I'm also in the third and final year of study towards a degree.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who are trying to help themselves around the world.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Because I can
lenders.occupational_info: Work with Elderly on Housing Issues

lenders.name: eugenio
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Shelah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women become independent and have a better lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a glass bead maker.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro-finance is a viable path to addressing issues of health, hunger and housing throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a human rights advocate and devote my energies to helping people improve their quality of life and pursue their dreams.

lenders.name: Pablo
lenders.loan_because:
Con una cantidad modesta, quizás lo que puedas gastar en una noche de juerga en nuestro primer mundo das una oportunidad a alguien de sacar adelante un negocio y mejorar su vida y la de quienes le rodean.

-------

With a little amount of money, perhaps less than you can spend at the restaurant or having a party night, you give someone an opportunity to take ahead his business as for improve his life and that of those around him.
lenders.occupational_info:
Trabajo en una empresa de televisión por satélite dando información a los clientes y gestionando sus servicios telefónicamente.

-------

I work as an agent at the customer service for a digital TV operator.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others be successsful and realize their goals.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.occupational_info: fabrication and construction for the arts, photography

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I get to help others and help them to make positive changes in their lives.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help others.   I want to support other people as they strive to attain their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I put people in the right job and give them the tools they need to do their job.

lenders.name: Victor
lenders.loan_because: I beleive that small gestures of goodwill will in turn affect the quality of life for others for the better.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Will Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in providing those in need with the means to create a better life for themselves and their communities through hard work and dedication.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend most of my time working for Union Square Advisors--kind of like a Kiva for U.S. Technology companies.

lenders.name: Mireya
lenders.loan_because: I would like the less fortunate to have an opportunity to live in better circumstances.  It is imperative to help another human being when one is able to do so...

lenders.name: Isil
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an excellent way to make a positive contribution to the world and help out people who need support.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctoral student working on verifying software and computer systems.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: The ammount I can lend is small but I think it might help and do as much good for the people who recieve as any thing else I might do.

lenders.name: Brian & Terah
lenders.loan_because: My wife Terah and I want to help, and this is both the most efficient and the most personal way we've found to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I've been an actor for over 30 years, and I also coach public speaking in high schools, colleges, and business groups.

lenders.name: Seeni
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance...
lenders.occupational_info: I help people make money to live their lives and not to live their lives to make money.

lenders.name: Gerald
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and enables people with dreams to be able to realise them.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist publicly listed small companies interface with the financial markets

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I am a midwife and professor of nursing at a University

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women can make a difference in the lives of their families and their communities.  I hope my share in the loan will help these strong women to reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked my whole life with seriously mentally ill adults.  These are also strong and brave people who try to better themselves step by step.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that the development of 
capitalism is the way to honestly
improve the world. Hard work and 
drive will free bonds faster than 
most governments will.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I am convinced that micro-lending is a good way to help entrepreneurs to fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach the English language to young people at a local high school in the United States.  I used to teach English in Loja, Ecuador.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: it is so satisfying to see how a small amount of money can make a huge difference in someone else's life. We are all one.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is a powerful tool for improving lives.

lenders.name: jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should
lenders.occupational_info: I play with my food

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I believe strongly in supporting those who are actively trying to make a better life for themselves.  A small  loan can make a significant difference in the life of someone.  I am especially interested in supporting women in these efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the computer chips that go into digital cameras.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I'm too cheap to give it away!  And I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Managing shared IT infrastructure within the judicial branch of the State of California

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: Lending is a good way to give back some of our good fortune
lenders.occupational_info: I am a project manager in Insurance

lenders.name: saul
lenders.loan_because: Making loans to those who have little turns them into capitalists  who want peace to prosper.  It is the best way to fight terrorism.

lenders.name: Dave and Marce
lenders.loan_because: Initiative deserves to be supported, particularly when it is in spite of the kinds of challenges many of these women and men face. We're also hoping being a part of Kiva will give us a little bit of a window to the rest of the world.

lenders.name: In Honor of Fred
lenders.loan_because: I had help in the beginning, now it is my turn to help others.

lenders.name: Kristin and Billy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people. I only loan 25$ because I'm too young to loan much money but 25$ can make a big change.

lenders.name: Koen
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: sarah eikenberry
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel like i did something good to help people who aren't as fortunate as me, a ten year old girl.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a 10-year-old girl who does shcool work 5 days a week, eight hours a-day.  we do simple things like reading, writing, and arithmatics.

lenders.name: Karyn
lenders.loan_because: in a small way, I can give back in gratitude for the fortune I've received.

lenders.name: Maria & Andrew
lenders.loan_because: we should

lenders.name: Gary & Judy
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a worthy cause, and I like to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I go fishing, camping and motorcycle riding, and hang out with my grandkids.

lenders.name: Jan G. & Melanie J.
lenders.loan_because: We are so fortunate to be able to loan and through the hard work by the people at KIVA we have the access to participate and change the world in our own little way!  Thank You!
lenders.occupational_info: We support people in creating the life they long to live!

lenders.name: patricia
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of beeing usefull to somebody far away.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: Micro-finance by way of the Internet is a beautiful thing.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable opportunity

lenders.name: Johanna
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I think microfinance is a good idea
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of economics at the university of Witten/Herdecke in Germany.

lenders.name: Alec
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: Work is hard, full of stress yet life is rewarding.  I am lucky.

lenders.name: Subodh&Margot
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a "positive" difference in lives of other people, if we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Subodh works as a software engineer. Margot works as a nursing home administrator.

lenders.name: Debby Bright
lenders.loan_because: I'm especially interested in seeing people from Afghanistan and Iraq (and other places) succeed.  I figure if citizens from these countries win, we in the U.S. also win.  The Iraqi entrepreneurs are especially important to me because I feel we invaded their country and as a result, chaos ensued.  This is the least we can do to help.  Plus it feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: I help buyers and sellers purchase or sell real estate (homes on small lots of land or condominiums).  I negotiate for my clients and act as an intermediary between people who are purchasing and those who are selling.   My job is to put my clients' interests first and foremost before anyone else's.

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: I love the fact that I can touch someone else in the world and lend them a hand.  It's a very tangible way to spread my loving energy.
lenders.occupational_info: I  work with businesses to have a positive impact on the lives they touch, leave things better than they found them and, as a result, become unstoppable in the marketplace!

lenders.name: marilyn
lenders.occupation: Director of Policy, Planning and Research

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: This organization provides me with a personal way of  Giving a hand in Helping others solve the universal problems of human existence.
lenders.occupational_info: I import furniture from other countries to sell to retailers in the United States

lenders.name: Aly
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: the world does not improve unless the good people use their time and money more effectively than the bad people.

lenders.name: Spanky
lenders.loan_because: I am

lenders.name: suzanne
lenders.loan_because: its a great way to help others help themselves and their communities..

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help move freight around the world.

lenders.name: Clair
lenders.occupational_info: I am a clinical psychology graduate student focusing on the older adult population.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone should give something back to those in need.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I am a follower of Jesus. He sowed into my life so that I could sow into others.

lenders.name: Meade Family
lenders.loan_because: We are all family.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family with a wide variety of jobs.

lenders.name: A. Colin Flood
lenders.loan_because: The powerful USD can do an awful lot of good in poor countries. I am fortunate myself. I would like to share my good fortune with those who are hard working and tolerant of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Write Help files, user manuals for computer companies. More prose than plot, my adult short stories weave romance, lust, pathos, danger, greed, racism, hypocrisy, irony, sex and murder together. Reviewers call my stories: “brilliant, sensitive, powerful, beauty, escapes ordinary definition"

lenders.name: Giulia
lenders.loan_because: I believe

lenders.name: dan
lenders.loan_because: I think the best way to help someone is to help them help themselves.  My hope is that these loans will make these businesses self-sufficient and improve the local business economy at the same time.
lenders.occupational_info: My company installs and repairs sprinkler systems in businesses and homes to put out fires that start there.  I make sure the guys have what they need when they show up to do the job, and the client is happy when we leave.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of people to lift themselves out of poverty through hard work and ingenuity.
lenders.occupational_info: I have seen a number of presentations on microcredit etc.. and I thought this was a good opportunity to get an inside view.

lenders.name: Daystarr
lenders.loan_because: I've been interested in the idea of microfinancing since I first heard about it on NPR, and wondered how I could get involved in it. Now I know! Through Kiva I can help people to heal in another dimension.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been blessed to be a healer, and I help people to heal themselves - physically, mentally, emotionally and spiritually. My clients range in age from 3 to 96, and live all over the U.S., in Europe and even one in Russia.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I think direct lending is far more powerful than government aid.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my clients grow their wealth and decide how best to give back to their communities and charities.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: Only wanting to help isn't good enough. You've got to be the change you want to see in the world.

lenders.name: Teamwork and Play
lenders.loan_because: It is so important for the present and the future...
lenders.occupational_info: A friendly place for self employed people

lenders.name: Frederic
lenders.loan_because: I think it is intelligent.. and... why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I create map of our earth.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because:
It's a privilege to be connected to our global community in this way.

I believe that we are called "to break the chains of injustice, get rid of exploitation in the workplace, free the oppressed,cancel debts. What I'm interested in seeing you do is: share your food with the hungry, invite the homeless poor into your homes, give clothes to the shivering, be available to your own families." -Isaiah 58:6

Kiva is a great way to take a step towards those lofty goals.
lenders.occupational_info: my job is to help people with disabilities learn how to do things that are important to them

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because:
The desire to succeed and thrive and provide for one's family transcends politics and religion.  Those of us who are fortunate must help those among us who are less fortunate.  It is our moral imperative.

How can one person make a difference ? Through organizations like Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain computers that students and teachers use in our local school district.

lenders.name: harlan
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a small contribution to helping others and I greatly respect people trying to help themselves in less (materially) fortunate circumstances than most of us.

lenders.name: The Dunn Family
lenders.loan_because: It's great to help someone succeed on such a personal basis!

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: I think paying back interest is what stops many good ideas and ventures and what keeps people in poverty.

lenders.name: Linsley & Michael
lenders.loan_because: Knowing that the small things I do for my community, on every scale, makes the world a little better for those in it. Giving to others and supporting others is something that is important to me and I want my son to value that as well.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because:
A small loan can pay off in so many big ways. I want to encourage people to be as independent and self-sufficient as possible - and providing a small loan helps to do that.
My daughters Erica and Linsley are so pleased to be involved!
lenders.occupational_info: I help others learn what to eat and how to prepare it to help improve or maintain their health and the health of their family

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: As a business owner, I know how empowering it can be to own your own business and to create your own opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer. I am also the Chief Instigator behind the Honest Marketing Revolution, where I help service-oriented microbusinesses fall in love with their marketing. I am particularly passionate about art, culture, nature and social change -- all of which build community and a strong sense of place.

lenders.name: Nadene
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of random acts of kindness.
lenders.occupational_info: During the week I work in marketing, helping companies with their advertising. On the weekends I teach people how to skydive!

lenders.name: Anthony and Vikki
lenders.loan_because: We believe everyone deserves an opportunity to improve his/her quality of life and the lives of those in his/her family and community.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: in a world where 1.2 billion people earn less than $1 a day, every dollar counts.

lenders.name: Jens Anders
lenders.loan_because: This way I can help make a difference to individuals in need.

lenders.name: H. Kanga
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping people, one person at a time, have the opportunity to help themselves might work better than outright charity in reducing poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people.

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: Most fortunately, the opportunity to freely choose when, what, how and where I work allows me great flexibility to pursue my life's work, to bring more happiness and betterment into the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
Past and current work includes:  extensive computer background, HIV/AIDS issues at many levels, television production, societal change and involvement, electronics, fundraising, automotive repair, event creation, and many other topics/subjects.

It is my deep and active interest to assist in the happiness, well being, stability, respect and honor of as many people as possible and do this with the highest regard taken from their perspectives and realities.  In consideration of their long and short term interests and realities, it continues to be my interest to best achieve this for others and gain the experience, understanding and abilities to best do so.

An a macro long term level, it is not yet clear to me exactly how or to what degree, and what role this financial assistance may positively (or negatively) assist in reaching such objectives and I hope to gain a better understanding and welcome others' input.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: This is a small but very real way to connect with people all over the world.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: it's exciting to see global empowerment at work.

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: it was a birthday gift from my husband

lenders.name: Austin
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people in developing countries take the innitiative to make their lives and those of their fellow countrymen better.
lenders.occupational_info: High School Student

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I've been lucky enough to grow up without any concern for money, and I feel an obligation to help a world that has provided for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a college student in New York City.

lenders.name: Janet and Hannah
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we like to help individuals around the world gain economic security.
lenders.occupational_info: Janet conducts behavorial science research and Hannah is an eighteen year-old student.

lenders.name: anonymous
lenders.loan_because: This is actually a remarkably good investment, not just socially, but also financially!  For me, Kiva has outperformed the stock market more often than not.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers, I draw, and I design things.

lenders.name: Stefan Tucker
lenders.loan_because: My family supports people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers, writing the software that controls them.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I'm a middle-aged mother who's also self-employed and knows how important loans are to family businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell land, I run a small farm, and I design web pages.

lenders.name: Sananda
lenders.loan_because: we are making miracles. Pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: To love is to live. Be Love. Live.

lenders.name: sharon
lenders.occupation: somos una mama y su nina de 8 anos.

lenders.name: Anupendra
lenders.loan_because: it is such an amazing idea, to personally be able to reach out and help someone half way around the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest money in companies that are trying to come up with new ideas for the healthcare field.

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because: I'm a single mom of 3. My children and I were extremely fortunate to have been born in this country!  We want to help because we can.
lenders.occupational_info: My job involves collecting environmental data in support of engineering projects around Alaska.

lenders.name: Nuala and Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: We are sorry that the Bush Administration has alienated much of the world. We want to set a better example of compassion and giving.
lenders.occupational_info: Nuala is a ceramic sculptor and teaches art to children and disbled adults. Jeffrey makes interactive computer games based on evolution.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: we are all one family.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Space Station flight controller.  I work in Mission Control helping operate the International Space Station.

lenders.name: Allen and Jill
lenders.loan_because: Change comes from the bottom up. And this is the bottom up solution to economic injustice. There is no lack of inspiration or creativity in the third-world, just a lack of capital.
lenders.occupational_info: We are college students in Southern California. We work part-time while we go to school at pizza store. We are delivery drivers.

lenders.name: Adelaide
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place when I grow up.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to look upon their lives with a sense of fulfillment. These people have motivation and purpose but not enough resources. The small effort on my part provides them with large rewards.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people locally in need of support and services.

lenders.name: Pace Mammas
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to support other women and especially other mothers.  We know that these sort of small loans can give these women the sort of lift for their business that will give them hope and strength to persevere!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a mother's group here in San Francisco.  In addition to being mothers and wives, we are business owners, nurses, doulas, students, doctors, dancers/yoga teachers, artists, executives...but most of all mothers.

lenders.name: Noah
lenders.loan_because: Its my world too.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend much of my work day fully occupied by the tasks of eating and sleeping. After work, I like to kick back a little bit with more eating and sleeping, the ocassional bath and sometimes, just for fun, throwing a screaming fit.

lenders.name: Max- Automik.com
lenders.loan_because: We dont want to invest in a soulless company, we want to invest in people.
lenders.occupational_info: Micro-enterprise development consultant, I specialize in setting up regional tourism development strategies which focus on sustainability upgrades and joint marketing strategies using co-operative micro-business network models.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse in an Emergency Room. I care for any injured person that may come through our doors.

lenders.name: Kupsi
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a good consept. And it's better than lend money to broke poker players :)
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure my customer's computer networks are up and running.

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: Lending small amounts of money directly to people who need it is a much more effective way for me to help others than to simply donate to charity. I feel a personal connection and investment in helping someone else via Kiva.org, rather than donating blindly to a large bureaucratic non-profit which will end up dispersing very little of my money to the people who need it.

lenders.name: Trond
lenders.occupational_info: Finance

lenders.name: Pierre
lenders.loan_because:
I think that present inequalities in the workd will lead us inevitably to World War Three. A nuclear war that will destroy all life on our planet , instantly. Hopefully, Kiva, among many other players, is helping alleviating poverty. I am glad to join !

Meanwhile, climate change by C02 emissions is the biggest threat on us.
So, I support green loans to help cut my CO2 emissions.
I always keep in mind that in C02, the very oxygen that we breath is trapped, while
we destroy every day the forests that produce it !

This is a message to Rally our efforts: S.O.P. Save Our Planet !
lenders.occupational_info:
I work toward the reformation of the present economy, guided by the principle of sharing the ressources of the planet so that 
no one on earth lacks food, shelter, healthcare and education. Yes! you deserve it  whatever your race, your origin, or gender !

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: There is no greater reward than the interest I receive knowing I can contribute to the re-birth of a nation and  its people - one entrepreneur at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I look for passionate people to connect with who want to make a difference in their lives, the lives of those closes to them, with hope that they will go forward and do good work for others.

lenders.name: Nese B.Larssen
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others whenever i can.

lenders.name: Bart
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a very good idea to help people by lending them money.
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher of geography

lenders.name: Stanley & Esther
lenders.loan_because: It is a good way to maintain direct contact with people throughout the world and help those in need who can  help themselves by starting and growing their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: We are enjoying retirement now.  Esther worked as a teacher and I was a attorney and manager in non-profits and government

lenders.name: Victor
lenders.loan_because: these loans are in memory of my parents, Gertrude and Julian, who were entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I make investments to help small and medium-sized companies to grow.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for the day. If you help a man learn to fish, you feed him for a lifetime.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and I build networks so that many computers can talk to each other from all around the world. We call it the "internet".

lenders.name: Elyssa
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help make a difference in people's lives, and in the world. I hope this helps people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I run a small hotel in Italy.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I am doing a good deed, in hope that I have helped a needy person have a good future and life.
lenders.occupational_info: 4th grade is challenging, and fun!

lenders.name: Veronique
lenders.loan_because: International Solidarity

lenders.name: ellie
lenders.loan_because: I think that I should help people who are not as well off as me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: It feels like the right thing to do. Also - at a time when Americans should be more connected to the world, I feel like we're not. This is a way for me to deal with that.
lenders.occupational_info: I help bring arts (music, dance, painting, theater) to schoolchildren in the New York City area, many of which are underprivileged and underserved.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I dance 24-7

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.  So little can do so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate organ donations for life saving transplants.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: Pride in the eyes of the child at the accomplishments of the parent is enough reason alone to participate in Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: 30 year CEO who embraces change and the exciting opportunities it brings.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: It's exciting to watch businesses develop and prosper from almost nothing. Now I can feel a part of it.
lenders.occupational_info: Safety inspection, testing and certification of cranes and lifting devices.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: It takes money to make money. I think Kiva is such a great idea! We have all needed a loan at some time to help us reach a goal. Entrepreneurs in every nation should be encouraged and supported. They have the power and the potential to help others help themselves as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in customer service for a large bank in the USA in the credit card division.

lenders.name: Trond Olav
lenders.loan_because: I like this way of helping people improve their lifes.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a mechanical engineer.

lenders.name: Laurie & Claude
lenders.loan_because: We get involved because we are entrepreneurs ourselves. We enjoy helping others to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We handcraft custom and unique menu covers for the restaurant industry.

lenders.name: robert
lenders.loan_because: This is a fantastic way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Attorney

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate and admire the work the people are doing.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help people clarify their values and reach their goals through listening to them talk about them.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can do what is possible to help small businesses throughout the world.

lenders.name: Steve, Olivia and Family
lenders.loan_because: Pay it forward

lenders.name: Gungagalunga
lenders.loan_because: I've always been a loaner.
lenders.occupational_info: I coalesce the vapors of life into a cogent and elegant idiom, but only part time.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: It is the least I can do without a thicket of red tape in which so much is lost and does not go to the person in need.

lenders.name: Jim Jenkins
lenders.loan_because:
I wish to DO the change we need to see in the world. It's important to me to see others have an opportunity to evolve, change and experience prosperity.
Knowing that I've contributed resources to allow others to experience a sense of empowerment and move toward creating success gives me a sense that I'm truly making a difference.
In my practice, I typically work with corporations and so it's exciting to know that I am leveraging my own success to be a conduit for change.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop Renaissance Leaders, those who see that there are new paradigms needed to manage the changes in the global marketplace. My goal is to provide tools and build competencies to help leaders navigate the seas of change. My company url is www.cvc-inc.com.

lenders.name: Ellie
lenders.occupational_info: high school student

lenders.name: Jeff,Lori,Alex,Dana
lenders.loan_because: We want to provide a missing catalyst, so others may realize their goals through honorable constructive effort.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people use machines more safely and develop cars and trucks that are safer for everyone.

lenders.name: matthieu
lenders.loan_because: a small help for people in the need. If you believe in humanity...

lenders.name: Sylvie
lenders.loan_because: Really good idea to lend to someone you know (a little). I prefer this than to give money anonymously.Et aussi il a le côté ludique de connaitre les filleuls.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 52, live in France,married, got 2 boys 23 and 25 and a daughter in law who is 26  and I am an ophthalmologist .

lenders.name: Maddy
lenders.loan_because: It's a great feeling knowing I can make a positive impact on someone else's life, even if they're half way across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: sam
lenders.loan_because: because i want to help people
lenders.occupational_info: i am a student

lenders.name: Xavier
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a way to participate to support both people and projects within communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I have created my own company working on Internet communication and I think Internet is like a market : a place to sell and buy but also to meet people, to exchange about lives and families, nice ideas and great projects :)

lenders.name: george
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: Im too young to work yet!

lenders.name: Kyla
lenders.loan_because: I recently took a trip to Peru and did community service. After two days of work, my fellow group members and I helped build stairs and a walkway to the community center. This trip inspired me to want to travel and volunteer in less fortunate communities. I want to continue loaning through Kiva as well. We take things for granted and through loans, I can give back and do something for someone who really needs my help.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to a  public high school in New York (NY).

lenders.name: Theodore
lenders.loan_because: they need it

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It seems to be a better idea than donating.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop diesel engines for cars.

lenders.name: Sergio
lenders.loan_because: Pienso que si KIVA se mantiene firme respecto a su política de transparencia y seriedad, es la mejor manera de contribuir de forma directa al desarrollo de la gente que lo necesita.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.occupational_info: I photograph newborn babies.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is much better to directly loan money to needy folks where they have a sense of gratitude to you than have some anonymous government agency 'donate' money to developing governments where the money may never go do the citizens of the country where, I believe, the money does the most good.
lenders.occupational_info: I design new aircraft components and upgrade old ones, and I also design tools to help aircraft fly safely.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I loan because people that have the luck of some extra money should help those who have not. It's just a question of elementary justice. This is my opinion
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an IT system administrator in a research laboratory which deals with mechanical production and industrial automation.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe that those with more have an obligation to share with those who have less. I have been blessed in many ways, so I carry on the wishes of my mother who always gave whether she had much or a little.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: this is one of the most effective ways of changing the world for the better

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is like a breath of fresh air. These examples illustrate that by writing a business plan, even the smallest money can be made to grow.  The loan, rather than handout appeals to me as free money never really seems to solve things.  Kiva is such a brilliant idea allowing someone like me with little to loan to be helpful to others, thanks Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info:
I love to photography and landscape and to exhibit my photographs in galleries and museums.
I live in Los Angeles.

lenders.name: Stephan and Inaki
lenders.loan_because: Common Good
lenders.occupational_info: Professor of International Business in Universidad del Rosario, Bogotá Colombia and Pharmacist at INVIMA, Bogotá Colombia

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my customers keep their computer running properly.  It is a tool they depend on, just like some people in other parts of the world depend on their shovel or their mule.  My customers could not make their living if their computer was broken and not properly functioning.

lenders.name: The Artz Family
lenders.loan_because: We learned in Catholic school to be involved in social justice activities. This is our activity for Easter 2007.
lenders.occupational_info: Dad is a college professor. Mom is a pre-school teacher.  All four kids go to school.

lenders.name: Richard and Janet
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something that makes a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Educators

lenders.name: Devin
lenders.occupation: Admissions at the OSU Moritz College of Law
lenders.loan_because: I feel that this is a much more personal and easier way to affect change in the world than giving money to a large organization.  I can't actually go to these places to make change, but this gives me the perfect opportunity to help someone out.

lenders.name: jeremy
lenders.loan_because: This website is amazing.  Lending small amounts to help empower people in the work they do can change lives.

lenders.name: Mark & Kay
lenders.loan_because: We did not get to where we are in our lives without the help and resources of family, friends, and others. We both see this as an investment in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a storyteller. My wife finds housing for those in need.

lenders.name: Cooper
lenders.loan_because: I like helping others, and I believe the best way to do so is to empower others to become independent through their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I help build new schools in American cities

lenders.name: Cole
lenders.loan_because: We have so much in Canada
lenders.occupational_info: I am 11 years old and in school

lenders.name: Sherryll
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children to read.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I feel that giving people the tools to change their own lives, as opposed to ignoring their lives or giving hand outs, instills a sense of respect. As a student I must keep my charitable pursuits low-cost or coming from my own labor and this is a way for me to help in addition to actual volunteering and donating.
lenders.occupational_info: I study, read, write papers, revise papers, and try to sound intelligent in class discussion.

lenders.name: Deva
lenders.loan_because: I want to see money do some good in the world. Poverty is a curse that no child has to bear.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I work in an industry that helps people travel the world without really seeing it.  I want to help the people no one sees.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people all over the US work from home.  They sell travel; I give them the tools they need to do their job.

lenders.name: Lyall
lenders.loan_because: I like micro-finance lending because it is real capitalism, promotes social justice and is not charity.

lenders.name: Abby and Eli

lenders.name: El Toro

money is an enabler in the same way as eating food enables someone to be active.  Likewise, too much of either makes you fat and lazy.

lenders.name: Kevin

lenders.name: john & holly

lenders.loan_because: money is the last thing that should be stopping you from making a difference in your life.

lenders.name: Dhonny

lenders.occupational_info: We contract with technology companies in the area.  My company does technical writing, software development, and graphic design.

lenders.name: Marcia

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance.

lenders.name: Nilay
lenders.loan_because: I owe you at least this much.

lenders.name: Sharon & Rob
lenders.loan_because: We want to encourage self-sufficiency and give hope to people who are seeing opportunities.  We were given encouragement and assistance when we were younger and want to do a little of the same.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Tadej

lenders.name: Doris & David
lenders.loan_because: Because we can. We want to share our blessings in life by helping others.

lenders.name: Jay

lenders.occupational_info: I help my company determine fair wages and benefits for employees in our plants around the world.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: People are what matter.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people who want to be classroom teachers how to use theatre to make class activities more exciting and memorable.

lenders.name: Hendrik
lenders.loan_because:
I think it is the responsibility of those who have all their needs met to share some of their opportunity with those who have been put at a disadvantage.
I would like encourage people who work hard to lift themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am consultant and software developer with Microsoft Dynamics NAV (Navision).

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I come from a developing country and I know how hard it is to make a living in those countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a law firm helping lawyers with their litigation cases.

lenders.name: paul
lenders.loan_because: I think helping small businesses helps the poor, and may be the best way to prevent wars.
lenders.occupational_info: emergency physician

lenders.name: Patrick & Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help others start find independent ways to support themselves, their families, and their communities.

lenders.name: Elina & Andreas
lenders.loan_because: We wish to empower and contribute to helping others to improve their living conditions

lenders.name: Carrie & Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to make a difference!  As a Californian, I want to support our nearest neighbors in Mexico in their desire to improve their lives in their own country.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to public high school students.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: I have a little extra and with a group like Kiva, that extra makes a difference!

lenders.name: betabrain
lenders.loan_because: i'm bored... *joke*

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I believe very strongly that the key to world peace and stability is giving people the chance to participate in commerce and build a better future for themselves and their families. Loaning through Kiva allows me to send money directly to people who I hope will make a real difference in developing regions around the world!

lenders.name: Salamishah
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help entrepreneurial women and men in developing countries expand their product line and build their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: As a literature professor, I use the arts and the classroom as agents for social change.  As a political activist, I have co-founded the non-profit organization, A Long Walk Home, Inc. which uses art therapy and the visual and performance arts to document, to educate, and to bring about social change by helping victims of trauma heal and increasing public awareness about anti-violence programs.

lenders.name: Matthew & Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I'm so fortunate to have 2 healthy boys and I hope for the same for her family as well!

lenders.name: Roland
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to better his/her life if they are willing to actively do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a trainer in environmental education and give workshops to young people between 6 and 25 years old.

lenders.name: Elena
lenders.loan_because: This makes sense!

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: It puts a smile on my face to see someone else succeed.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: These people need it more than I do.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people around the world.  What seems like a little to people in America can change someone's life in another country.
lenders.occupational_info: Accountant.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: To help women and children.

lenders.name: Elsie & Al
lenders.loan_because: - well, it's selfish, really.  We loan because each loan recipient  makes our world a better, richer and more interesting place to live.  We're grateful.
lenders.occupational_info: Al works with his head.  I work with my hands.  We both try to work with our hearts.

lenders.name: Chris and Barbara
lenders.loan_because: What a terrific way to get involved in a more personal and positive way with people around the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I were teachers in Alaska for nearly thirty years.  We also served in the Peace Corps as teachers in Micronesia.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: Living without hope makes for a very long day.
lenders.occupational_info:
I renovate and build housing for
people of moderate means, so that
they might dream of a better future.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: Sharing is good for everyone . . .
lenders.occupational_info: I just finished graduate school for Public Health and am looking for part time work in my new field as well as continuing working as an holistic practitioner who practices shamanic healing. . .

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: it's so easy to make a real difference in a real person's life! The best way to fight poverty is by giving people the means to provide for themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time college student pursuing a family social science degree, and I hope to go on to law school. I hope to make a positive difference in children's lives. I also work as a waitress in a bar near campus

lenders.name: Prasana
lenders.loan_because: I know it takes a lot to get off the ground and for the little that I can part with if it can help, more power to the recipient.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of eradicating world poverty and promote entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that enables people to have peace of mind through the means of securing insurance coverage for their belongings. I manage the individuals that provide the service to these customers.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this is a powerful grassroots method for empowerment, poverty alleviation and development.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a geography major and have developed great interest in international development, specifically in microfinance.
